name: Hospital for Special Surgery
description: The foundation gave at least $326,000 to New York Presbyterian Hospital and $250,750 to its sister institution, the Hospital for Special Surgery, which is also based in New York City.

stories.headline: Where Did Trump's Foundation Donate Its Money? IRS Documents Reveal Surprising Answers
